price: Nígbà tí ó bá sọ̀kalẹ̀ sí gbàgede wọn, òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ náà yó sì burú fún àwọn ẹni-akìlọ̀-fún.
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
